name: Kaboor
description:
KABOOR - Sometimes You Just Need To Run!

Storyline :

Some young teenagers has trapped in a dark cave with a lot of monsters inside it. They can't be kill the killed. All the things you can do is just RUN!

Genre :

Puzzle

Objective :

Avoid all the monsters and find the door to go to the next level

Features : 

- Four different character to be chosen

- Player can use skill to run faster, the skill has cooldown

- Different monster, different behaviour

- Dark labyrinth, lot of surprises

Control :

Up Arrow - Move Up

Down Arrow - Move Down

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Space - Use Skill
